mapper.select: SELECT go.orders_no ordersNo ,go.goods_title goodsTitle ,go.orders_amount ordersAmount ,go.goods_price goodsPrice ,p.payment_state paymentState ,p.payment_method paymentMethod ,a.customer_mail customerMail FROM payment p INNER JOIN (SELECT g.goods_no goods_no ,g.goods_title goods_title ,g.goods_price goods_price ,o.orders_no orders_no ,o.orders_amount orders_amount ,o.payment_no payment_no FROM goods g INNER JOIN orders o ON g.goods_no = o.goods_no) go ON go.payment_no = p.payment_no JOIN address a on a.address_no = p.address_no
